video.title: Monkey Thieves
video.synopsis: This documentary series follows a lively troop of rhesus macaques living at a holy temple in a Hindu culture that reveres monkeys near Jaipur, India.

episodes.synopsis: Forced by food shortages to leave the temple, the Galta Gang heads into Jaipur, where they ransack an apartment. During their escape, Kavi is injured.
episodes.title: Apartment Job

episodes.synopsis: While the electrocuted Kavi fights for life at an animal hospital, the troop raids the fruit market and tangles with Jaipur's meanest macaque: Fang.
episodes.title: Fang's Market

episodes.synopsis: When the troop raids a cart, the owner calls Jaipur's monkey catcher, leaving the rest of the gang to defend the temple from invading langur monkeys.
episodes.title: Monkey Catcher

episodes.synopsis: The captured monkeys released in the forest struggle to find their way home. The gang steals food from a car, and Kavi's prognosis looks grim.
episodes.title: Taxi Raid

episodes.synopsis: Hunger proves distracting for alpha male Tarak as Zamir plots to overthrow him. A devout Hindu brings bags of fruit and treats to save the troop.
episodes.title: Skid Row

episodes.synopsis: Zamir's coup ends in tragedy, and he's ejected from the troop. The lost monkeys make it back to the temple just as the monsoon season finally arrives.
episodes.title: Monsoon Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Kavi says goodbye to his caretaker and prepares to return to the wild. The exiled Zamir steals an ice cream from a child, outraging the locals.
episodes.title: One Bad Apple

episodes.synopsis: Zamir searches for a new troop to lead against his former comrades at the temple, while Kavi waits to see if his family will accept his return.
episodes.title: Return of the Rebel

episodes.synopsis: Zamir takes the lead when his new troop's alpha gets captured. The old gang accepts Kavi, but he opts for freedom and disappears.
episodes.title: The Great Escape

episodes.synopsis: Zamir leads his new troop on lucrative raids of a jewelry store and a hotel, where he gets drunk and reunites with his nephew Kavi.
episodes.title: Trading Places

episodes.synopsis: Animal caretaker Suresh tries to nurse a mother monkey and her baby back to health. Zamir plots an attack on Tarak and the temple troop.
episodes.title: Rising Forces

episodes.synopsis: Esha gets lost in the city. Zamir and his troop launch their attack on the temple, but Tarak and the loyal Kamal mount a strong defense.
episodes.title: Heroes and Villains

episodes.synopsis: The gang gains several new faces. But in the wake of the great battle, Tarak is serious injured, and the troop wonders who will replace him.
episodes.title: A New Dawn

episodes.synopsis: As the troop expands and the economy plunges, scarce offerings at the temple leave the macaques competing with each other for sustenance.
episodes.title: Divided We Stand

episodes.synopsis: The Galta Gang splits into two troops, with Bipin, Yash and Tito leading a splinter group into the city -- and into the traps of the monkey catcher.
episodes.title: Hard Times

episodes.synopsis: Rani and the temple troop rely on handouts, while Bipin and the exiles search for a new base. As prospects dim, they suddenly find a ray of hope.
episodes.title: Searching for Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: With Jaipur overrun by langurs, the splinter group must try every trick in the book to locate food. In a faraway forest, Zamir reappears.
episodes.title: Urban Exile

episodes.synopsis: The remaining Galta troopers leave the temple when offerings dry up, but a close encounter with the monkey catcher sends them scurrying back home.
episodes.title: Street Life

episodes.synopsis: The exiles find a new home at a fruit market. The temple gang also locates a new territory, only to discover it's a war zone between two other gangs.
episodes.title: Home Hunters

episodes.synopsis: Kamal's leadership wavers, putting his troop in danger. The monkey catcher trains a new team of recruits to trap more monkey thieves.
episodes.title: Beggar's Banquet

episodes.synopsis: The troop ends up on the wrong side of the law when Binita grabs a policeman's radio and Esha steals a tailor's turbans. A stowaway arrives by truck.
episodes.title: Cops and Robbers

episodes.synopsis: As Zamir homes in on his former family, he finds new faces at the temple. Kamal finally proves his worth to Rani, but bites off more than he can chew.
episodes.title: Missing in Action

episodes.synopsis: Kamal makes a last-ditch effort to salvage his leadership with a bold raid on a hospital. Zamir has a breakthrough in his quest to find his old troop.
episodes.title: Drug Raid

episodes.synopsis: As festival crowds pack the streets, Rani has no idea that her old enemy Zamir has returned. Teejay fights for his life at the clinic.
episodes.title: Colour & Calamity

episodes.synopsis: Rani finally comes face to face with her arch enemy, Zamir. Bipin and the splinter group live the good life at the market until rivals suddenly appear.
episodes.title: An Unlikely Hero

episodes.synopsis: Fortunes change as Zamir takes firm charge of the troop and leads them back to the Galta Temple, where a battle awaits with the surprised langurs.
episodes.title: Deliverance

episodes.synopsis: Ten months after birthing a baby boy, Rani seems lethargic. At the fruit market, Bipin, Yash and Tito have reached maturity but make a big mistake.
episodes.title: Coming of Age

episodes.synopsis: Ejected from their troop, Bipin, Yash and Tito search for water. They are soon blamed for the violent raids of Zamir's wayward twins, Gangol and Ragin.
episodes.title: Zamir’s Legacy

episodes.synopsis: When Queen Rani disappears, Zamir's leadership is challenged by other temple males. Gangol and Ragin attack a bakery with their rogue troop.
episodes.title: Royal Retreat

episodes.synopsis: Leaderless, the temple gang descends into chaos. Gangol and Ragin gorge on a delivery truck's split peas. Bipin, Yash and Tito try country living.
episodes.title: Paradise Lost

episodes.synopsis: Now on the right track, monkey catcher Dhanna Lal goes undercover to catch the unruly twins. Bipin, Yash and Tito may have finally found a new troop.
episodes.title: Sweet Revenge

episodes.synopsis: At the temple, Esha pulls rank to save a baby. Gangol and Ragin attack a sweet paan vendor. Bipin and Tito suffer a betrayal at the fruit market.
episodes.title: Three’s a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Bipin and Tito briefly join a bachelor troop. Langurs take over the leaderless temple complex. Dhanna Lal tries again to stop Gangol and Ragin.
episodes.title: Allied Forces

episodes.synopsis: As the Gangaur Marriage Festival unfolds, Bipin and Tito ingratiate themselves with the Palace females, while Dhanna Lal finally has a small victory.
episodes.title: Last Man Standing

episodes.synopsis: It's war when Gangol and Ragin's gang raids Dhanna Lal's kite store. Esha discovers that the ranks support her and assumes leadership of her troop.
episodes.title: Low Life

episodes.synopsis: When Gangol and Ragin fall into a trap set by Dhanna Lal, it's new would-be member, Bipin manages to free them and their troop.
episodes.title: Bad Boys

episodes.synopsis: The twins' troop with newest member Bipin boldly raids a children's birthday party, leading monkey catcher Dhanna Lal to attempt a new strategy.
episodes.title: Gate Crashers

episodes.synopsis: The twins' troop is driven out of the city by Dhanna Lal's corralling strategy, but as they near the Galta Temple, Bipin recognizes his former home.
episodes.title: Like Father, Like Sons

episodes.synopsis: Temple leader Queen Esha finally gets an alpha male, Garud, to rule beside her. They'll need each other when the twins' troop arrives at the temple.
episodes.title: Arrested Development
